text: Steven Joseph Chabot ( ; born January 22, 1953) is an American politician and lawyer. He has been the United States representative for since 2011. He is a member of the Republican Party. In 2022, Chabot lost his re-election campaign to Democrat Greg Landsman. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Cincinnati Category:Politicians from Cincinnati Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Steve Chabot
